page.title: Batteries
page.text: Matter Megadrive offers 2 types of batteries. 3 if you count the creative battery.
The first one is the basic [item name=battery] which holds [rf name=battery].
Then there is the [item name=hc_battery]. It holds [rf name=hc_battery].
And finally there is the creative battery with unlimited RF that can only be obtained in creative mode.
